thread.title: Nancy J. LAne
thread.title_full: LuxHair Wigs reviewed by Nancy J. LAne

author: Nancy J. LAne
title: Nancy J. LAne
text: I am 70 and my hair is thinning. For several years I have looked for a nice wig, but the caps were too small and heavy !! I saw you demonstrate your wigs and sent for one....the textured pixie !!! I love the style, as I can't have a lot of hair around my face. I now have 10 of them....5 different colors with a back up for each color. I will never go out with my real hair again !!! The cap is large enough so it doesn't slide up on my head and I don't even know I have it on. Everywhere I go, people complement me on my hair and tell me I look 10 years younger !!!! Thank you so much....keep them coming !!!!
